name: Docker-4-bioinformatics
tagline: Short Course to get Bioinformaticians at CRUK-CI up-to-speed on Docker
body:
### Introduction to Docker for Bioinformatics

We introduce Docker and how it can be used to distribute Bioinformatics software

## Pre-requisities
1. Watch this introductory video on [youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLipr7tTuA4)
1. Install Docker for your operating system. [Docker for Mac](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac) requires OS X 10.10.3 Yosemite or newer. [Docker for Windows](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-windows) requires Windows 10. If you do not have Mac OSX 10.10.3 or Windows 10, you will have to install [Docker Toolbox](https://docs.docker.com/toolbox/overview)

2. Follow the installation instructions
3. Once docker is sucessfully running, you can run the following at the command-line:-

`docker pull ubuntu`

`docker pull trausch/delly/`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
